info.name: Artemis Dark Mode
info.description: A simple Dark Mode for the Artemis TUM platform. Reduces eyestrain for our excellent TUM students who are working late.
info.additionalInfo: The comment box is now at its default location again, also disabled a minor unnecessary notification on exercise start. In case you want to remove or resize the comment box again, just uncomment the marked lines at the beginning of the source code.
